room_title: Escape room "Code 13" by Xterious Escape in Las Vegas
room_address: 105 E Reno Ave, Suite 1, Las Vegas, NV 89119
room_description:
The year is 2028. The virus Code13 was discovered less than half a year ago and more than 75 million people have died from it already. Counting down your days, you receive a tip that a secret lab has developed the antidote to the virus.
A bribed security guard will help you get inside; he is securing the lab for you for one hour! You have to work quickly and quietly to obtain the antidote. Hurry! Your life is at stake!
